title: Cover Crops and Reduced Tillage on a Vegetable Farm with Thomas Ruggieri

tasks.task: Operating and maintaining a farm with various agricultural practices
subtasks: Managing a CSA farm with member participation in harvest
Growing 40 different vegetable types using biological farming methods
Applying cover crops and compost to improve soil organic matter
Using electric and traditional farm equipment (e.g., tractor, flail mower)

Implementing biological methods to improve plant nutrition and flavor
Fermenting vegetables and raising chickens for value-added products

tasks.task: Fisking the cover cropping and intercropping system
subtasks: Planning and sowing cover crops using a vegetable seeder
Flail mowing cover crops and rolling them down for no-till planting
Weeding and managing competition from grasses and bindweed
Monitoring and adjusting planting timing based on soil moisture and weather conditions
